mapper.select: select * from notice where n_del = 'N' order by n_num desc

select n_num, n_subject, ad_id, n_contents, n_cnt, to_char(n_wdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') n_wdate, to_char(n_udate,'yyyy-MM-dd') n_udate, n_del from notice where n_subject like '%'||#{n_subject}||'%' and n_del = 'N' order by n_num desc

select n_num, n_subject, ad_id, n_contents, n_cnt, n_wdate, n_udate, n_del from ( select /*+ index_desc(notice pk_n) */ rownum rn, n_num, n_subject, ad_id, n_contents, n_cnt, n_wdate, n_udate, n_del from notice where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and n_del = 'N') where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into notice (n_num, n_subject, ad_id, n_contents, n_cnt, n_wdate, n_udate, n_del) values (seq_n.nextval, #{n_subject}, #{ad_id}, #{n_contents}, 0, sysdate, sysdate, 'N')

select seq_n.nextval from dual
insert into notice (n_num, n_subject, ad_id, n_contents, n_cnt, n_wdate, n_udate, n_del) values (#{n_num}, #{n_subject}, #{ad_id}, #{n_contents}, 0, sysdate, sysdate, 'N')
mapper.update: update notice set n_cnt = n_cnt+1 where n_num = #{n_num}
update notice set n_del = 'Y' where n_num = #{n_num}
update notice set n_subject = #{n_subject}, n_contents = #{n_contents}, n_udate = sysdate where n_num = #{n_num}
mapper.select: select count(n_num) from notice where n_del = 'N'
